categories.name: 主流叙事风格
categories.description: 常用的主流视频叙事风格

styles.name: 日系动漫风格
styles.prompt_keywords: anime style, japanese animation, big expressive eyes, detailed facial expressions, dynamic hair and clothing, bright color contrast, speed lines, effect glows, manga aesthetic
styles.description: 大眼睛角色设计，细腻的面部表情，动态的头发和服装褶皱，明亮的色彩对比，典型的日本动画美学，包含速度线和特效光晕

styles.name: 韩式唯美插画
styles.prompt_keywords: korean illustration style, soft pastel colors, delicate character features, dreamy lighting, fine texture details, warm color temperature, blurred background, manhwa aesthetic
styles.description: 柔和的色调，精致的人物五官，梦幻的光影效果，细腻的纹理质感，温暖的色温，朦胧的背景虚化

styles.name: 欧美卡通风格
styles.prompt_keywords: western cartoon style, exaggerated proportions, bold outlines, saturated colors, simplified shapes, strong action poses, comic book aesthetic
styles.description: 夸张的人物比例，粗线条轮廓，饱和度高的色彩，简化的形状设计，强烈的动作表现力

styles.name: 新海诚风格
styles.prompt_keywords: makoto shinkai style, hyper-realistic backgrounds, stunning sky rendering, dramatic lighting, detailed environmental atmosphere, cinematic composition, anime movie quality
styles.description: 超写实的背景细节，绚丽的天空渲染，强烈的光影对比，细腻的环境氛围，电影级的构图

styles.name: 皮克斯3D动画
styles.prompt_keywords: pixar 3d animation style, rounded character design, expressive faces, warm ambient lighting, detailed textures, cinematic depth of field, family-friendly aesthetic
styles.description: 圆润的角色造型，夸张但自然的表情动作，温暖的环境光照，细腻的材质纹理，电影级的景深效果

styles.name: 超写实3D渲染
styles.prompt_keywords: photorealistic 3d render, realistic human modeling, accurate skin textures, physically based lighting, high detail environments, cinematic post-processing, unreal engine quality
styles.description: 逼真的人物建模，真实的皮肤纹理，物理准确的光照系统，高精度的环境细节，电影级的后期效果

styles.name: 风格化3D卡通
styles.prompt_keywords: stylized 3d cartoon, simplified geometry, candy colors, soft edges, toy-like textures, exaggerated physics, playful aesthetic
styles.description: 简化的几何造型，鲜艳的糖果色彩，柔和的边缘处理，玩具般的质感，夸张的物理效果

styles.name: 电影摄影风格
styles.prompt_keywords: cinematic photography, widescreen composition, professional depth of field, cinema color grading, motion blur, professional lighting setup, film look
styles.description: 宽屏比例构图，专业的景深控制，电影级色彩调色，动态模糊效果，专业灯光布置

styles.name: 纪录片风格
styles.prompt_keywords: documentary style, handheld camera feel, natural lighting, unprocessed footage aesthetic, journalistic composition, raw and authentic
styles.description: 手持摄影的自然晃动感，真实的环境光，未经修饰的画面质感，新闻摄影构图

styles.name: 复古胶片风格
styles.prompt_keywords: vintage film photography, film grain texture, faded colors, light leaks, old photo scratches, nostalgic color temperature, analog aesthetic
styles.description: 胶片颗粒质感，褪色的色彩效果，轻微的漏光效果，老照片的划痕纹理，怀旧的色温

categories.name: 特色艺术风格
categories.description: 具有独特艺术表现力的风格

styles.name: 水彩童话风格
styles.prompt_keywords: watercolor illustration, transparent wash effects, soft color transitions, hand-painted irregular edges, paper texture, dreamy color palette, children's book style
styles.description: 透明水彩的晕染效果，柔和的色彩过渡，手绘的不规则边缘，纸张纹理质感，梦幻的色彩搭配

styles.name: 彩铅手绘风格
styles.prompt_keywords: colored pencil drawing, pencil stroke texture, soft color layers, sketch line quality, paper grain texture, hand-drawn aesthetic
styles.description: 彩色铅笔的笔触纹理，柔和的色彩层次，素描的线条感，纸张的颗粒质感

styles.name: 扁平矢量插画
styles.prompt_keywords: flat vector illustration, geometric shapes, solid color blocks, clean lines, modern color scheme, no shadows, minimalist design
styles.description: 几何化的形状设计，纯色块的组合，简洁的线条，现代的配色方案，无阴影的平面设计

styles.name: 版画艺术风格
styles.prompt_keywords: woodcut print style, strong black and white contrast, carved line texture, rough lines, vintage printing effect, linocut aesthetic
styles.description: 强烈的黑白对比，木刻版画的纹理，粗犷的线条刻画，复古的印刷效果

styles.name: 日式少年漫画
styles.prompt_keywords: shonen manga style, dynamic panel composition, speed lines, action lines, exaggerated expressions, black and white ink art, screentone effects
styles.description: 动态的分镜构图，速度线和集中线，夸张的表情符号，黑白的墨线艺术，网点纸效果

styles.name: 美式超英漫画
styles.prompt_keywords: american comic book style, strong contrast, bold lines, primary colors, dynamic action poses, comic book printing effect, superhero aesthetic
styles.description: 强烈的明暗对比，粗犷的线条，鲜艳的原色使用，动态的动作姿势，漫画书印刷效果

styles.name: 欧洲艺术漫画
styles.prompt_keywords: european comic art, detailed line art, sophisticated environments, unique color usage, cinematic composition, bande dessinée style
styles.description: 细腻的线条艺术，精致的环境描绘，独特的色彩运用，电影化的构图

styles.name: 四格条漫风格
styles.prompt_keywords: webtoon style, vertical scroll format, simple character design, clear panel layout, exaggerated expressions, speech bubbles, mobile-optimized
styles.description: 简洁的人物设计，清晰的分格布局，表情包式的夸张表现，对话气泡

styles.name: 古典油画风格
styles.prompt_keywords: classical oil painting, thick paint strokes, chiaroscuro lighting, warm tones, renaissance composition, canvas texture, old master style
styles.description: 厚重的油画笔触，古典的明暗对比法，温暖的色调，文艺复兴时期的构图，画布纹理

styles.name: 印象派风格
styles.prompt_keywords: impressionist painting, broken color strokes, light and shadow capture, blurred contours, vibrant color contrast, monet style, outdoor lighting
styles.description: 斑驳的色彩笔触，光影的瞬间捕捉，朦胧的轮廓，鲜艳的色彩对比

styles.name: 表现主义风格
styles.prompt_keywords: expressionist art, distorted forms, emotional colors, rough brushstrokes, exaggerated perspective, psychological intensity
styles.description: 扭曲的形态，强烈的情感色彩，粗犷的笔触，夸张的透视

styles.name: 超现实主义
styles.prompt_keywords: surrealist art, dreamlike scenes, illogical combinations, photorealistic technique, strange visual effects, dali style, subconscious imagery
styles.description: 梦境般的场景组合，不合逻辑的元素拼接，精细的写实技法，奇异的视觉效果

categories.name: 文化特色风格
categories.description: 不同文化背景的艺术风格

styles.name: 中国水墨画风
styles.prompt_keywords: chinese ink painting, ink wash gradients, negative space aesthetics, landscape composition, brush stroke effects, rice paper texture, sumi-e style
styles.description: 墨色的浓淡变化，留白的意境美学，山水画的构图，毛笔的笔触效果，宣纸的晕染质感

styles.name: 日本浮世绘
styles.prompt_keywords: ukiyo-e japanese woodblock print, flat colors, precise line work, traditional color scheme, woodblock texture, edo period aesthetic
styles.description: 平面化的色彩，精致的线条勾勒，传统的配色方案，木版画的质感

styles.name: 敦煌壁画风格
styles.prompt_keywords: dunhuang mural style, golden colors, flying apsaras, buddhist art elements, ancient fresco texture, silk road aesthetic
styles.description: 金碧辉煌的色彩，飞天的动态美感，佛教艺术元素，古老的壁画质感

styles.name: 工笔画风格
styles.prompt_keywords: gongbi fine brush painting, meticulous line drawing, delicate coloring, realistic forms, silk texture, chinese traditional painting
styles.description: 精细的线条勾勒，淡雅的设色，写实的造型，丝绸般的质感

styles.name: 维多利亚风格
styles.prompt_keywords: victorian era style, ornate decorative details, vintage color palette, elaborate costumes, classical architecture, period aesthetic
styles.description: 华丽的装饰细节，复古的色彩搭配，精致的服装设计，古典的建筑背景

styles.name: 新艺术运动风格
styles.prompt_keywords: art nouveau style, flowing curves, natural plant motifs, elegant decorative elements, soft colors, alphonse mucha inspired
styles.description: 流畅的曲线设计，自然的植物纹样，优雅的装饰元素，柔和的色彩

styles.name: 包豪斯风格
styles.prompt_keywords: bauhaus style, geometric design, functionalist aesthetics, clean lines, primary colors, modernist approach
styles.description: 几何化的设计，功能主义美学，简洁的线条，原色的运用

styles.name: 8位像素风格
styles.prompt_keywords: 8-bit pixel art, low resolution pixels, limited color palette, retro game console aesthetic, nes style graphics
styles.description: 低分辨率的像素点阵，限制的色彩palette，复古游戏机的视觉效果

styles.name: 16位像素风格
styles.prompt_keywords: 16-bit pixel art, richer color depth, detailed pixel work, classic rpg aesthetic, snes style graphics
styles.description: 更丰富的色彩层次，精细的像素艺术，经典RPG游戏美学

styles.name: 现代像素艺术
styles.prompt_keywords: modern pixel art, high resolution pixels, modern lighting effects, detailed animation, indie game aesthetic
styles.description: 高分辨率的像素艺术，现代的光影效果，精致的动画细节

styles.name: 赛博朋克2077
styles.prompt_keywords: cyberpunk style, neon lights, high tech low life, rain reflections, holographic projections, body modifications, blade runner aesthetic
styles.description: 霓虹灯光效果，高科技低生活美学，雨夜的反光效果，全息投影元素，机械改造人体

styles.name: 蒸汽朋克风格
styles.prompt_keywords: steampunk style, brass and gears, victorian era clothing, steam powered machinery, retrofuturistic aesthetic
styles.description: 黄铜和齿轮元素，维多利亚时期服装，蒸汽动力机械，复古未来主义

styles.name: 废土末世风格
styles.prompt_keywords: post-apocalyptic wasteland, ruined environments, rusty metal, dust storms, survival aesthetic, fallout style
styles.description: 破败的环境，锈迹斑斑的金属，沙尘暴效果，生存主义美学

styles.name: 霓虹发光风格
styles.prompt_keywords: neon glow effect, vibrant neon colors, glowing outlines, dark background contrast, electronic visual aesthetic, tron style
styles.description: 鲜艳的霓虹色彩，发光的轮廓线，暗背景的对比，电子感的视觉效果

styles.name: 剪影艺术风格
styles.prompt_keywords: silhouette art style, pure black figures, colorful gradient background, simple shape expression, dramatic lighting
styles.description: 纯黑的人物剪影，彩色的背景渐变，简洁的形态表现，戏剧性的光影

styles.name: 双重曝光风格
styles.prompt_keywords: double exposure effect, layered image blend, transparent mixing, poetic visual expression, photographic technique
styles.description: 两个画面的叠加融合，透明的混合效果，诗意的视觉表达

styles.name: 剪纸艺术风格
styles.prompt_keywords: paper cut art style, layered paper effect, clear cut silhouettes, shadow depth layers, handcraft texture
styles.description: 层叠的纸张效果，清晰的轮廓剪裁，阴影的层次感，手工艺术质感

styles.name: 黏土动画风格
styles.prompt_keywords: claymation style, clay texture, handmade marks, soft forms, stop motion aesthetic, wallace and gromit style
styles.description: 黏土的质感表现，手工捏制的痕迹，柔和的形态，定格动画美学

styles.name: 低多边形风格
styles.prompt_keywords: low poly art style, simplified geometric facets, bold color blocks, modern minimalist aesthetic, crystallized effect
styles.description: 简化的几何面片，鲜明的色块，现代的极简美学，晶体化的效果

usage_notes.prompt_construction: 建议将prompt_keywords直接加入到AI绘图提示词中
usage_notes.style_combination: 可以组合多个风格获得独特效果
usage_notes.settings_application: recommended_settings可根据具体AI工具调整使用
